response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business. Given its high value and unique features, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $8,500. This offer is tailored to recognize your potential to benefit greatly from its capabilities. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of partnering with you for success.", "product_price": 8500}
